file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-82-06 - WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR I AND SPAR II - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR I AND SPAR II - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the wing root section for general condition. B. Related Zones: 531/631. C. Zone Boundaries: STA Y = -960.00 (rib 1) thru STA Y = -3815.00 (rib 9) and spar I and spar II. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR I ALL 05-20-82-200-801-A ♦ AND SPAR II - EXTERNAL GENERAL VIS- UAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-82 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-82-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. WING ROOT SECTION BETWEEN SPAR I AND SPAR II - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 57-Z531-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of wing, at zones 531/631, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing root section I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-82 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) (Figure 602) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the wing root zone for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, skin deformation, sealant condition, erosion, corrosion, painting bad condition, and deteriorated protective treatment (Figure 601). (2) Examine the upper skin/spars attachment for condition (Figure 602). (3) Examine the upper skin/wing stub attachment for condition (Figure 602). (4) Examine the spar 1/wing stub attachment for condition (Figure 602). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-82 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
